sentences.sContent: He’s not in the same class (= not as good ) as her at tennis.
sentences.sCn: 他的网球水平并不如她。

phrases.pCn: 世界级，世界水平；一流的
n. 工人阶级；劳动阶级
[口]低劣的；劣等的；不合格的；没地位的

trans.tranOther: a group into which people or things are divided according to their quality or abilities
